title: Yaaro Yaar Aval Lyrics Arima Nambi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yaaro Yaar Aval
Singer(s): Runa Rizvi, Shabbir Kumar
Movie: Arima Nambi
Music: Sivamani

Saturn poovin vaasam kanden
oodha vanna Saturn poo
en oorukulle nuzhanthennai
mayakki vittaal.
idhayathai sila nodi niruthiye
marupadi iyaki vittaal.

are you ready
come on sing with me

yaa ro yaar aval
yaa ro yaar aval
yaa ro yaar aval
yaa ro yaar aval

kashmiri thena
mumbai pen maana
kolkata meena
delhi pen thaana
en thozhan ennai ketaane
illai enre naan sonnene
aiyo tamizh uraithaal
en nenjaiye parithaal

manathil vaalai vaalai erikiraal
... rasikiraal
azhagi yaaro yaar aval
azhagi yaaro yaar aval

araiyil thedinen
yaar undhan devathai
azhagin uchamai
yaar antha thaaragai

yaaro yaaro aval
yaaro yaaro aval
unadhu kannaal neeyum thedinaal
kedaikamaataal yeno kooradi
unakku yaaro yaar aval
enakku yaaro yaar aval

yaar pole saaya
un pole konjam
yen indha vetkam
kaanome nenjam

avalin per enna?
ennai yen ketkirai
avalin en enna?
ennai yen paarkiraai

yaaro yaaro aval
yaaro yaaro aval
vidaiyai arinthum ennai seendinaal
tamizhil ennai paada thoondinaal
muraithu ninraal yaar aval
manathai venraal yaar aval
